title: Leading industries targeted by DDoS attack traffic 2017
summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Industry, and Percentage of attack traffic in each Industry on the y axis.
The Percentage of attack traffic is appeared to be the highest at Industry Gaming and lowest at Industry Media and entertainment.
The Percentage of attack traffic of Industry Gaming is 79.0% larger than the minimum value at Media and entertainment.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Industry in the x axis and Percentage of attack traffic in the y axis.
The Percentage of attack traffic is highest at Industry Gaming and lowest at Industry Media and entertainment.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Industry, and Percentage of attack traffic in each Industry on the y axis.
The Percentage of attack traffic is appeared to be the highest at Industry Gaming and lowest at Industry Media and entertainment.
The Percentage of attack traffic of Industry Gaming is 79.0% larger than the minimum value at Media and entertainment.
max_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Industry, and Percentage of attack traffic in each Industry on the y axis.
Industry Gaming has the highest Percentage of attack traffic and Media and entertainment has the lowest Percentage of attack traffic.
Industry Internet and telecom has the second highest value for Percentage of attack traffic.
The difference of Percentage of attack traffic between the highest and lowest Industry is 78.0.
Industry Gaming is higher than any other Industrys with value 79.0, followed by Internet and telecom, and Software and technology. Down to Industry Media and entertainment with the lowest value 1.0.
Similar Percentage of attack traffic is found in Industry Financial services, and Software and technology.
The Industry Media and entertainment tends to be 6.26 percent lower than average.
The Percentage of attack traffic is 101.0 if we add up values of all Industrys.
